A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
One of the worst Star War movies to date. 
Characters are all over the place\, pointless side stories\, Luke character wasn't well written. Princess Leia character didn't make any sense. Too many characters. Awful misplaced humour \, Snoke was just the most poorly thought villain who has so much potential. Rey is far to OP\, if you go back to old SW movies you will see Jedi require training. Kylo Ren seems like a teenager with bipolar issues. Rey can just get around everywhere without explanation. They also go to Las Vegas. lol

I can go on.
